name: marketingquiz
0:
”Alexa, open marketing quiz”
”Alexa, launch marketing quiz”
”Alexa, start marketing quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marketing quiz
des:
Test your bussiness marketing skills with nx3 marketing quiz. It is a multiple choice quiz with questions having two/four options to answer. Alexa will ask any question, and you can answer it by saying the option number.
Say "Alexa, open marketing quiz" to begin the quiz.
